replies.body:
LeBlanc lol.

Ekko's key weakness is his squishiness. If you see him positioning aggressively when his ult is down, immediately focus him. His dash won't do much if you lock him down with CC.

If you need more help with dealing with this specific champion, I suggest heading over to the [gameplay & strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) board.
